tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE field_mapping (
    field_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    field_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    latitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
    longitude DOUBLE PRECISION NOT NULL,
    crop_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    crop_health_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE CropHealth (
    health_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT,
    crop_type TEXT,
    health_status TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES FieldMapping(field_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SensorData (
    sensor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES FieldMapping(field_id)
);

CREATE TABLE CropHealth (
    crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT,
    health_status VARCHAR(50),
    reported_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES FieldMapping(field_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FieldImages (
    image_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT,
    image_path VARCHAR(255),
    image_type VARCHAR(50),
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES FieldMapping(field_id)
);

CREATE TABLE WeatherData (
    data_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    field_id INT,
    temperature DECIMAL,
    humidity DECIMAL,
    wind_speed DECIMAL,
    recorded_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES FieldMapping(field_id)
);
CREATE TABLE Field (field_id INT PRIMARY KEY, field_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, field_size FLOAT NOT NULL, location_lat FLOAT NOT NULL, location_long FLOAT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE Crop (crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY, crop_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, crop_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, planting_date DATE NOT NULL, field_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES Field(field_id))
CREATE TABLE Health_Reading (reading_id INT PRIMARY KEY, reading_date DATE NOT NULL, health_score INT NOT NULL, crop_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (crop_id) REFERENCES Crop(crop_id))
CREATE TABLE Worker (worker_id INT PRIMARY KEY, worker_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, hire_date DATE NOT NULL, specialization VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE Equipment (equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, equipment_type VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, field_id INT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY (field_id) REFERENCES Field(field_id))
